description: '''Goa trance''' is an [[electronic dance music]] style that originated in the early 1990s in the Indian state of [[Goa]]. Goa trance often has [[Drone (sound)|drone]]-like [[bassline]]s, similar to the [[Minimal techno|techno minimalism]] of 21st century [[psychedelic trance]] (psytrance). Psychedelic trance developed from Goa trance. The typically long songs built on progressive beat changes are said to put the listener in a “trance”.
